anya-e1214n:12_0: Chanda’hānitthamo’kāraṃ-dhātvantānaṃ siyākva ci, yūnaṃ dīgho ca dhātumhā-pubbama’tthapadaṃ api.
anya-e1214n:14_0: Bhū sattāyaṃ paca pāke gamusappa gatimhi (ca);
anya-e1214n:18_0: Ku sadde kucchite ṭaṅka dhāraṇe maki maṇḍane.
anya-e1214n:22_1: lokanavittisu cakkhavutimhi (tu) rukkha (ca) khe thirahiṃsakhaṇe niya,
anya-e1214n:22_5: jāladukhesu (tu) dikkha (ca) dukkha (ca) ikkha disa’ṅka na ko’kha suse.
anya-e1214n:23_1: [A] nikkha cumbane’(pi) sikkha vijju’pādu’ pāsānamhi rakkha guttivāraṇe (pi) uñchane (siyā’pi) bhikkha
anya-e1214n:23_2: yāvaladdhya’laddhisū (pi) vakkha rosasaṃhatesu mokkha muttiyaṃ caje (pi) cikkha vācabodhanesu.
anya-e1214n:24_0: [Ba] nakha makha rakha naṅkhāmaṅkharakkhī’khīlaṅkhā lakha vakha ikha iṅkhā uṅkha vaṅkhū’kha gatyaṃ vakhi
anya-e1214n:24_1: makhi kakhi kaṅkhe khī khaye ukkha seke khu khutadhanisu (vutto) khe(’tha) khāde supe (ca.)
anya-e1214n:27_0: Agī igī rigī ligī vagī gatya’tthadhātavo.
anya-e1214n:29_0: Silāgha katthane jaggha hasane aggha agghane;
anya-e1214n:32_0: Vaca byattavace yāca yācane ruca dittiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n:33_0: Suca soke kuca sadde (atho) vica vivecane.
anya-e1214n:39_0: Paca yāte kaci-vacca dittiyaṃ maci dhāraṇe.
anya-e1214n:41_0: Puccha sampucchane muccha mohasmiṃ lañcha lakkhaṇe;
anya-e1214n:44_0: Taccho tanukiraye piñcha piñchane rāja dittiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n:48_0: Bhaja saṃsevane sañja saṅge (tu) iñja kampane.
anya-e1214n:54_0: Majja saṃsuddhiyaṃ lajja lajjane tajja tajjane.
anya-e1214n:57_0: Guja-kuja dvayaṃ sadde akhyatte khajja bhakkhaṇe.
anya-e1214n:59_0: Bhajja pāke viji bhayacalane vīja vījane;
anya-e1214n:60_0: Khajī gamanavekalle jī jaye ju jave (siyā;).
anya-e1214n:62_0: Jhe cintāyujjha ussagge gamane aṭa-paṭa dvayaṃ;
anya-e1214n:63_0: Naṭa nacce raṭa paribhāsane vaṭa veṭhane.
anya-e1214n:65_0: Vaṭṭa āvattane vaṇṭa vaṇṭatthe kaṭa maddane;
anya-e1214n:72_0: Ghaṭi saṅghaṭṭane taṭṭa cchedane muṭa maddane.
anya-e1214n:74_0: Paṭha byattavace heṭha bādhāyaṃ veṭha veṭhane;
anya-e1214n:81_0: Maṇḍa vibhūsane caṇḍa caṇḍikke bhaḍi bhaṅḍane.
anya-e1214n:87_0: Kuḍi dāhe paḍi gate hiḍi āhiṇḍane (siyā;);
anya-e1214n:93_0: Vaḍḍha saṃvaḍḍhane kaḍḍha kaḍḍhaṇe bhaṇa bhāsane;
anya-e1214n:95_0: Soṇa vaṇṇe guṇa’bhyāse iṇa-pheṇa dvayaṃ gate,
anya-e1214n:107_0: Gotthu vaṃse patha-pantha gate nanda samiddhiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n:119_0: Madi balye muda-madā santose madda maddane;
anya-e1214n:122_0: Vida lābhe dada dāne rudi assuvimocane;
anya-e1214n:133_0: Dā dave du gatīvuddhayaṃ dā dāne vida jānane,
anya-e1214n:134_0: Tadi ālasiye bādha bādhāyaṃ gudha kīḷane;
anya-e1214n:139_0: Sidhu gatimhi yudha sampahāre vidha vedhane,
anya-e1214n:142_0: Sidha-sādha (ca) siddhimhi dhe pāne indha dittiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:143_0: Māna pūjāya vana-sana sambhave ana pāṇane;
anya-e1214n:146_0: Gupa gopanake gupa saṃvaraṇe tapa santāpe tapa issariye,
anya-e1214n:147_0: Cupa mandagate tapuubbege rapa-lapa vākye sapa akkose;
anya-e1214n:150_0: Kapi kiñcicale kappa sāmatthe vepu kampane;
anya-e1214n:155_0: Capa sāntve pu pavane jhapa dāhe supo saye,
anya-e1214n:159_0: Amba sadde (ca) assāde tāyane sabi maṇḍane;
anya-e1214n:164_0: Labha lābhe jambha gattavināme subha sobhane,
anya-e1214n:165_0: Bhī bhaye rabha rābhasse (cā)’rambhe khubha sañcale;
anya-e1214n:168_0: Sumbha saṃsumbhane sambha vissāse yabha methune;
anya-e1214n:176_0: Damo dame nama name (atho) sama parissame,
anya-e1214n:177_0: Yamu uparame nāse ama yāte mu bandhane;
anya-e1214n:184_0: Cāya sampūjane tāya santāne pāya vuddhiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:187_0: Tara taraṇasmiṃ thara santharaṇe bhara bharaṇasmiṃ phara sampharaṇe,
anya-e1214n:188_0: Sara gati cintā hiṃsā sadde phura calanādo hara haraṇasmiṃ;
anya-e1214n:190_0: Ri santatismiṃ ri gate ru sadde khuracchidasmiṃ dhara dhāraṇamhi,
anya-e1214n:191_0: Jara jīraṇatthe marapāṇacāge khara sekanāse ghara sevanamhi;
anya-e1214n:193_0: Garo nigareṇa seke dara ḍāhe vidāraṇe,
anya-e1214n:197_0: Kura kkose nara naye jāgara supinakkhaye;
anya-e1214n:200_0: Khala sañcalane phulla vikāse jala dittiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n:203_0: Dala duggatiyaṃ nīla vaṇṇe mīla nimīlane;
anya-e1214n:218_0: Ava rakkhaṇe jīva pāṇadhāraṇe (tu) plavo gate;
anya-e1214n:221_0: Davo (tu) davane devu devane sevu sevane;
anya-e1214n:225_0: Hve avhāne keva seke dhuva yātrā thiresu (ca;);
anya-e1214n:227_0: Asa gasa adane ghasa adanasmiṃ-isa pariyese isuicchāyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:230_0: Kusa akkose dusa appīte-tusa santose pusa posamhi,
anya-e1214n:231_0: Rusa ālepe rusa hiṃsāyaṃ-masu macchere usu dāhe (’pi;)
anya-e1214n:233_0: Hasa hasanasmiṃ ghusa saddasmiṃ-tasa ubbege trasa ubbege,
anya-e1214n:236_0: Gavesa maggaṇe paṃsa nāsane disa pekkhaṇe,
anya-e1214n:239_0: Saṃsa pasaṃsane issa issāyaṃ kassa kassane,
anya-e1214n:240_0: Dhaṃsa padhaṃsane siṃsa icchāyaṃ ghaṃsa ghaṃsane;
anya-e1214n:246_0: Kisa sāṇe kasa gate kasa hiṃsāvilekhane;
anya-e1214n:252_0: Su sadde su pasavane si saye (ca) si sevane;
anya-e1214n:255_0: Raha cāgasmiṃ muha mucchāyaṃ-maha sattāyaṃ bahu saṃkhyāne;
anya-e1214n:258_0: Ruha sañjanane ūha vitakke vaha pāpaṇe;
anya-e1214n:261_0: Nindāyaṃ garaho īha ghaṭṭane miha sevane;
anya-e1214n:264_0: Vhe saddamhi hasane hā cāge luḷa manthane
anya-e1214n:268_0: Tuda byathāyaṃ (tu) nuda kkhepaṇe likha lekhaṇe,
anya-e1214n:269_0: Kuca saṅkocane rica kkharaṇe khaca bandhane;
anya-e1214n:277_0: Puṇo subha kiraye vatta vattane cata yācane,
anya-e1214n:284_0: Kapa acchādane vappa vāraṇe khipa peraṇe;
anya-e1214n:286_0: Supo saye chupo phasse (vattate) capa sāntvane,
anya-e1214n:289_0: Sumbha saṃsumbhane jambha jambhane jubha nicchubhe,
anya-e1214n:290_0: Ṭhubha niṭṭhubhane camu adane chamu hīḷane;
anya-e1214n:292_0: Jhamu dāhe chamu adane irīya vattane’(pi ca),
anya-e1214n:298_0: Tila snehe cila vāse hila hāve silu’ñchane,
anya-e1214n:299_0: Bila bhede thūla caye kusacchedana pūraṇe;
anya-e1214n:302_0: Phula phasse musa theyye thusa appikirayāya (tu)
anya-e1214n:310_0: Nī pāpaṇe muna ñāṇe hana hiṃsāgatīsu (’pi)
anya-e1214n:312_0: Pārakkhaṇamhi pā pāne brū vācāyaṃ viyattiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:313_0: Bhā dittiyaṃ mā pamāṇe (atho) yā pāpuṇe (siyā;)
anya-e1214n:316_0: Asa (dhātu) bhuvi (khyāto) si saye sā samatthiye;
anya-e1214n:319_0: Hū dāne’(pi ca) ādāne havyadāne (ca vattate,)
anya-e1214n:320_0: Hā cāge kamu yātrāyaṃ dā dāne dhā (ca) dhāraṇe;
anya-e1214n:324_0: Rudhi āvaraṇe muca mocane rica recane,
anya-e1214n:325_0: Sica seke yuja yoge bhuja pālanabhojane;
anya-e1214n:333_0: Sivu tantūnasantāne khī khaye khā pakāsane;
anya-e1214n:335_0: Kā-gā sadde (pi) ghā gandho’pādāne ruca rocane,
anya-e1214n:336_0: Kaca dityaṃ muca moce (atho) vica vivecane;
anya-e1214n:338_0: Rañja rāge sañja saṅge khalane majja suddhiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:339_0: Yujo samādhimhi lujo vināse jhā vicintane;
anya-e1214n:341_0: Tā pālane chidi dvedhākāre mida sinehane,
anya-e1214n:344_0: Sida pāke padagate vida sattā vicintane,
anya-e1214n:345_0: Dī khaye supane dā (ca) dāne dātva’vakhaṇḍane;
anya-e1214n:348_0: Kudha kope sudha soce rādha hiṃsāya siddhiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n:351_0: Vidha vedhe gidha gedhe rudhi āvaraṇā’disu;
anya-e1214n:354_0: Sinā soce kupa kope tapa santāpa pīṇane;
anya-e1214n:356_0: Lupacchede rupa nāse pakāse dipa dittiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:357_0: Dapa hāse labha lābhe lubha gedhe khubho cale;
anya-e1214n:362_0: Lī silese dravīkāre vā gatī bandhanesu (ca,)
anya-e1214n:369_0: Susa sose bhasa adhopāte nasa adassane;
anya-e1214n:370_1: Sā’ssāde sā’vasāne (ca) sā tanūkaraṇe (pi ca) hā cāge muha vecitte naha sajjanabandhane naha soce pihicchāyaṃ siniha-
anya-e1214n:372_0: 117. Su savaṇe saka sattimhi khī khayamhi gi saddane,
anya-e1214n:373_0: Apa-sambhū (ca) pāpuṇane hi gatimhi vū saṃvare;
anya-e1214n:376_0: Kī vinimaye ci caye ji jaye ñā’vabodhane,
anya-e1214n:379_0: Pī tappaṇe mā pamāṇe khipakkhepe mi hiṃsane,
anya-e1214n:380_0: Mi pamāṇe mu bandhe (ca) lu pacchede si bandhane
anya-e1214n:384_0: Tanu vitthāre saka sattismiṃ-du paritāpe sanu dānasmiṃ,
anya-e1214n:385_0: Vana yācāyaṃ manu bodhasmiṃ-hi gate apa pāpuṇanasmiṃ (hi,)
anya-e1214n:389_0: Cura theyye loka (dhātu) dassane aki lakkhaṇe,
anya-e1214n:398_0: Vacca ajjhāyane acca pūjāyaṃ vaca bhāsane,
anya-e1214n:399_0: Raca patiyatane suca pesuññe ruca rocane;
anya-e1214n:402_0: Sajjā’jja ajjane tajja tajjane vajja vajjane;
anya-e1214n:404_0: Yuja saṃyamane pūja pūjāyaṃ tija tejane,
anya-e1214n:405_0: Paja magga saṃvaraṇe gate bhaja vibhājane;
anya-e1214n:411_0: Naṭa nacce caṭa-puṭa bhede vaṇṭa vibhājane;
anya-e1214n:414_0: Guṇṭha oguṇṭhane heṭha bādhāyaṃ veṭha veṭhane
anya-e1214n:415_0: Guḍi veṭhe kaḍi-khaḍi bhedane maḍi bhūsane;
anya-e1214n:418_0: Taḍi saṃtāḷane piṇḍa saṅghāte chaḍḍa chaḍḍane;
anya-e1214n:420_0: Vaṇṇa saṃvaṇṇane cuṇṇa cuṇṇane āṇa pesane,
anya-e1214n:421_0: Gaṇa saṃkalane kaṇṇa savaṇe cinta cintane;
anya-e1214n:423_0: Santa saṅkocane manta gutta bhāsana jānane,
anya-e1214n:426_0: Yata nīyyātane gantha sandabbhe attha yācane,
anya-e1214n:427_0: Katha vākyappabandhe (ca) vida ñāṇe nude cuda;
anya-e1214n:432_0: Hiḷāda (tu) sukhe gandha sūcane vidha kampane,
anya-e1214n:433_0: Randha pāke (atho) māna pūjāyaṃ nu tthutimhi (tu;)
anya-e1214n:435_0: Thana devasadde ūna parihāne thena coriye,
anya-e1214n:436_0: Dhana sadde ñapa tosa nisāna māraṇā’disu;
anya-e1214n:438_0: Lapa vākye jhapa dāhe rupa ropaṇaādisu,
anya-e1214n:439_0: Pī tappane (siyā) kappa vitakke labhi vañcane;
anya-e1214n:457_0: Rusa pārusiye khuṃsa akkose pusa posane;
anya-e1214n:462_0: Si bandhe missa sammisse kuha vimbhāpane siyā,
anya-e1214n:465_0: Pihi’cchāyaṃ siyā vīḷa lajjāyaṃ eḷa phāḷane
anya-e1214n:466_0: Hīḷa gārahiye pīḷa bādhāyaṃ taḷa tāḷane
anya-e1214n:470_0: Bhuvādī ca rudhādī ca-divādi svā’dayo gaṇā,
